Perfect Day

30 Oct 2013 — Deden Fathurahman
less than 1 minute read (46 words)

I heard Lou reed from a friend when i was in college, and this is the first song i’ve been listening to, love it. sadly he died at 71

♫ Lou Reed - Perfect Day
